Class Inventory

java.lang.Object
domain.Inventory
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Inventory extends Object implements Serializable

  • Constructor Details

    • Inventory

      public Inventory()
      Constructor for creating a new empty Inventory

  • Method Details

    • addItem

      public void addItem(Item item) throws PoobkemonException
      Adds an item to the inventory Each item can only be held up to 2 times
      Parameters:
      item - The item to add to the inventory
      Throws:
      PoobkemonException - EXCESS_CAPACITY_OF_ITEMS if the inventory is full or if already have 2 of the same item

    • countItems

      public int countItems(Item item) throws PoobkemonException
      Counts how many of a specific item are in the inventory
      Parameters:
      item - The item to count
      Returns:
      The quantity of the specified item
      Throws:
      PoobkemonException - ITEM_DONT_EXIST if the item is not in the inventory

    • addPokemon

      public void addPokemon(Pokemon pokemon) throws PoobkemonException
      Adds a Pokemon to the inventory A Pokemon can only be added once to the inventory
      Parameters:
      pokemon - The Pokemon to add
      Throws:
      PoobkemonException - POKEMON_ALREADY_EXIST_IN_THE_INVENTORY if the Pokemon is already in the inventory

    • contains

      public boolean contains(Pokemon pokemon)
      Checks if a specific Pokemon is in the inventory
      Parameters:
      pokemon - The Pokemon to check for
      Returns:
      true if the Pokemon is in the inventory, false otherwise

    • contains

      public boolean contains(Item item)
      Checks if a specific item is in the inventory
      Parameters:
      item - The item to check for
      Returns:
      true if the item is in the inventory, false otherwise

    • getPokemonByName

      public Pokemon getPokemonByName(String name) throws PoobkemonException
      Retrieves a Pokemon from the inventory by name
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the Pokemon to retrieve
      Returns:
      The Pokemon with the specified name
      Throws:
      PoobkemonException - POKEMON_NOT_FOUND if no Pokemon with that name exists in the inventory

    • getItemByName

      public Item getItemByName(String name) throws PoobkemonException
      Retrieves an item from the inventory by name
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the item to retrieve
      Returns:
      The item with the specified name
      Throws:
      PoobkemonException - ITEM_NOT_FOUND if no item with that name exists in the inventory

    • getPokemons

      public TreeMap<String,Pokemon> getPokemons()
      Gets all Pokemon in the inventory
      Returns:
      A TreeMap of all Pokemon, keyed by their names

    • canStillFighting

      public boolean canStillFighting()
      Checks if there are any Pokemon that can still battle
      Returns:
      true if there is at least one alive Pokemon, false otherwise

    • getAlivePokemons

      public ArrayList<Pokemon> getAlivePokemons()
      Gets a list of all alive Pokemon in the inventory
      Returns:
      An ArrayList containing all alive Pokemon

    • getAlivePokemons

      public ArrayList<Pokemon> getAlivePokemons(Pokemon pok)
      Gets a list of all alive Pokemon except the specified one Useful for selecting a Pokemon to switch to
      Parameters:
      pok - The Pokemon to exclude from the list
      Returns:
      An ArrayList containing all alive Pokemon except the specified one

    • canChange

      public boolean canChange(Pokemon pokemon)
      Checks if a Pokemon can be switched to during battle A Pokemon can be changed to if it's alive and in the inventory
      Parameters:
      pokemon - The Pokemon to check
      Returns:
      true if the Pokemon is alive and in the inventory, false otherwise

    • useItem

      public void useItem(Pokemon pokemon, Item item) throws PoobkemonException
      Uses an item on a Pokemon Removes the item from inventory after use
      Parameters:
      pokemon - The Pokemon to use the item on
      item - The item to use
      Throws:
      PoobkemonException - ITEM_NOT_FOUND if the item is not in the inventory, POKEMON_DOESNT_EXIST_IN_THE_INVENTORY_OR_NOT_EXIST if the Pokemon is not in the inventory

    • useItem

      public void useItem(Pokemon pokemon, String item) throws PoobkemonException
      Uses an item by name on a Pokemon Convenience method that calls useItem(Pokemon, Item)
      Parameters:
      pokemon - The Pokemon to use the item on
      item - The name of the item to use
      Throws:
      PoobkemonException - Various exceptions depending on item and Pokemon status

    • getItemsArray

      public ArrayList<String> getItemsArray()
      Gets a list of all item names in the inventory
      Returns:
      An ArrayList containing the names of all items in the inventory
